text: Revamp may refer to: == Changes == *Revamp, informal term for maintenance, repair, and operations *Revamp, informal term for editing of natural-language text *Revamp (gaming), informal term for boost or renovation of a game's UI, system stats, items, rules, etc. and vice versa. Also known as buffing. == Music == *ReVamp, a progressive metal band founded by Floor Jansen, after the split up of After Forever, her former band **ReVamp (album), the self-titled debut album from the band above *Revamp, a tribute album to Elton John and Bernie Taupin
title: Revamp
